subject: AFC Asian Cup Qatar 2023/2024
body:
AFC Asian Cup Qatar 2023/2024
The Asia Pacific Lottery Association (APLA).
 
Dear Lucky Winner/Email Owner,
 
CONGRATULATIONS: This is to notify you that you have been selected as the winner of the AFC Asian Cup Qatar 2023/2024 Game Promotion Draw, with the sum of US$1,000,000.00 Dollars (One Million United States Dollars), which was conducted using an open computer ballot Java system. This promotional lottery draw is supported by Qatar Airways Group QCSC, Pepperstone Australian online broker, and other sponsors.
 
Every participant's email address was automatically entered into the drawing, as Google gathered all of the Active Gmail.com users worldwide for this campaign.
 You were fortunate enough to win the prize in the "A" category with your Gmail address attached to Reference Number: AFC80010011. To enable you to claim your prize, a Pin Number has been provided. The pin number is 00357721.
 
For you to receive your US$1,000,000.00 Dollars (One Million United States Dollars). Please get in touch with your claim representative as indicated below. Your payment file will be forwarded to the designated payment bank once he has completed processing it. The bank will then get in touch with you to arrange an immediate transfer of your funds to any designated bank account.
 
Contact information for your claim agent.
Agent: Mr. Abdulrahman Al-Saeed
Contact Email: 
afcabdulrahmana@gmail.com
 
Please send him the information listed below.
 
1. Full Names:
2. Country:
3. Age:
4. Occupation:
5. Mobile Number:
6. REFERENCE NUMBER: AFC80010011
 
Send the above aforementioned details to make your claim. The only person you should get in touch with is (Mr. Abdulrahman Al-Saeed), the agent stated above, who will give you instructions on how to claim your prize money. To prevent duplicate claims, kindly keep your winning Reference Numbers private.
 
Sincerely,
 
Mr. Mohammed Yousef Al-Suwaidi
LOTTERY COORDINATOR.

subject: Re: AFC Asian Cup Qatar 2023/2024
body:
Hello Mr. Mohammed Yousef,

Wow, this is such exciting news! I can't believe my email address was selected in the drawing. I'm curious about how many people participated in this campaign? And how was my email address chosen among all the active users worldwide?

I see that you've mentioned a reference number and a pin number for claiming the prize. Could you please clarify what these numbers are used for? 

Also, could you tell me more about the Asia Pacific Lottery APLA? How long has it been running and what other types of prizes have been awarded in the past?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
John
